resources.string:
" EXPLAINING TWEAKS

KERNEL TWEAKS
-Added entropy
-Edited dirty_expire_centisecs and writeback values to an highter to improve battery
-reduced swappiness to 30-cache pressure value to improve performance
-page cluster set to 3, better multitask

FSYNC: fsync is an android capability that allows the system to write continuously data from ram to flash to avoid data loss due to a sudden shoutdown. It is enabled by default, if you have a stable system you can also disable it because it can improve performance (less writing by cpu, less battery using, better performance!) It's at your risk!

CRT-OFF EFFECT: Introduced in 2.3.6 it is a screen of animation, if your kernel supports it you can enable or disable it in time by this app

CPU TUNE: included a cpu control, you can choose frequencies, governors and schedulers, and the settings are sticky also after reboot!

IO STATS: disabling this the system overall is more smooth

EXT4 enhancements: various tweaks to the ext4 partitions, all should be better and smoothly

SD CARD TWEAKS: increase sd card r/w from 128 (def) to 2048, now you will have better read and write speeds of your sdcard

BATTERY: You can set the deepest sleep state (3-4-5) and disable the fair sleepers, this can improve batery backup

VACUUM: It cleans the system, the apps, it is such a cleaner that keeps clean the sqlite databases.

GPS: choose your favourite country and enjoy a faster gps locking! No more waiting!

GPU renderer: You can disable the hardware render to enable the software one. UI is snappier.

MAJOR TWEAKS WILL BE ENABLED ONLY AFTER REBOOT!
 ENJOY!
"
Delete all scripts and restore to default settings
" Let\'s tart Tuning! \n Swipe the menu from left to right
You must be rooted in order to use this app.
Your device seems to lack frequency scaling
If you are running a custom ROM or if you think your phone supports frequency scaling, send your CPU data in order to add support for your phone.
